entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename does not work with "alias to any type" for dynamic #67642
    Backlog
  • Rename does not work with "alias to any type" for tuples and arrays #67640
  • CS8987 is reported when using lang version < 11 and net7.0 target on scoped mismatch #67638
  • Ensure source generator nodes keep track of removed entries #67634
  • `SyntaxNodeProvider` should keep track of removed items #67633
  • [8.0.100-preview.3.23178.7] Incremental Roslyn Source Generator ToDisplayString() method returns different value in 7.0.20X and later #67632

Closed

  • Colors are inconsistent for types with "alias to any type" #67641
  • region cannot be collapsed #67555

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Move to newer version of Roslyn analyzers" #67643
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Remove optional parameters from IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #67635
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove excessive allocations of SourceLocations with mergedecls #67627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce the number of Location objects created during binding #67601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add razor compiler EA assembly to VSIX #67501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • State machine and lambda EnC analysis fixes and simplification #67608
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged, Next
  • Perf: Modify StringIndentationTaggerProvider to not tag the whole file on every request. #67631
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to newer version of Roslyn analyzers #67630
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix main-vs-deps merge overwriting merge from 17.6-vs-deps #67629
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Switch semantic model to use `OneOrMany` instead of ImmutableArray for hot paths that often return a single value. #67587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [Lightbulb Perf] AnalyzerDriver performance improvements #67591
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Revert "Revert "Remove unused TS brace completion code"" #66781
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [17.6] Cache source generator node tables only if their state counts match #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Null coalescing assignment for nullable value type should set state of nullable type not underlying type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
